div.h1: File:Flag of the People's Republic of China.svg

img.alt: File:Flag of the People's Republic of China.svg

div.p: Flag_of_the_People's_Republic_of_China.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 3,000 × 2,000 pixels, file size: 1 KB)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

td.span: Flag of the People's Republic of China.svg
td.div: ‪中文(简体)‬: 中华人民共和国国旗；五星红旗
‪中文(繁體)‬: 中華人民共和國國旗；五星紅旗
‪中文(香港)‬: 中華人民共和國國旗；五星紅旗
བོད་ཡིག: ཀྲུང་ཧྭ་མི་དམངས་སྤྱི་མཐུན་རྒྱལ་ཁབ། དར་ཆ།
Mìng-dĕ̤ng-ngṳ̄: 中华人民共和国国旗 / Dṳ̆ng-huà Ìng-mìng Gê̤ṳng-huò-guók guók-gì

a.title: en:Flag of the People's Republic of China

div.a: Flag of the People's Republic of China

td.div: Esperanto: Flago de Popolrespubliko de Ĉinio

a.title: en:Bandera de la República Popular China

div.a: Bandera de la República Popular China

td.div: فارسی: پرچم جمهوری خلق چین

a.title: fr:Drapeau de la République populaire de Chine

div.a: Drapeau de la République populaire de Chine

td.div: Gaeilge: Bratach an Daon-Phoblacht na Síne
贛語: 中華人民共和國國旗
Hak-kâ-fa: 中华人民共和国国旗 / Chûng-fà Ngìn-mìn Khiung-fò-koet Koet-khì
हिन्दी: जनवादी गणराज्य चीन का ध्वज
Interlingua: Bandiera del Republica Popular de China
Interlingue: Flagga del China
Italiano: Bandiera della Repubblica popolare cinese

a.title: ja:中華人民共和国の国旗

div.a: 中華人民共和国の国旗

td.div: Қазақша: جۇڭحۋا حالىق رەسپۋبليكاسى‎ بايراعى
한국어: 中華人民共和國의國旗；五星紅旗 / 중화인민공화국의국기；오성홍기
Кыргызча: Kıtay El Respublikası tuusu
Lingua Franca Nova: Bandera de Xina
ລາວ: ທຸງຊາດຈີນ
文言: 中華人民共和國之國旗

span.b: မြန်မာဘာသာ:

span.style: font-family:Padauk, Parabaik, Myanmar3, Myanmar2, Myanmar1, MyMyanmar

div.span: တရုတ်ပြည်သူ့သမ္မတနိုင်ငံ၏ အလံတော်

td.div: Монгол: ᠲᠥᠷᠢᠶᠨ ᠳᠠᠯᠪᠠᠠ ᠪᠦᠭᠦᠳᠡ ᠨᠠᠶᠢᠷᠠᠮᠳᠠᠬᠤ ᠳᠤᠮᠳᠠᠳᠤ ᠠᠷᠠᠳ ᠤᠯᠤᠰ/ Төрийн далбаа Бүгд Найрамдах Хятад Ард Улс
Bân-lâm-gú: 中华人民共和国的国旗仔 / Tiong-hoâ Jîn-bîn Kiōng-hô-kok ê kok-kî-á
Novial: Flage de Populen Republike de China

a.title: pt:Bandeira da República Popular da China

div.a: Bandeira da República Popular da China

td.div: Slovenščina: Zastava Ljudske republike Kitajske
Тоҷикӣ: Parcami Çumhurii Xalqii Cin
Tagalog: Watawat ng Republikang Popular ng Tsina
Türkçe: Çin Halk Cumhuriyeti'nin bayrağı
Татарча/Tatarça: Kıtay Xalık Cömhüriyatenıñ bayrağı
ئۇيغۇرچە / Uyghurche‎: جۇڭخۇا خەلق جۇمھۇرىيىتى دۆلەت بايرىقى

div.div: اردو: جۇڭخۇا خەلق جۇمھۇرىيىتى کا پرچم

td.div: O'zbek: Xitoy Xalq Respublikasi bayrog`i
吴语: 中华人民共和国国旗
Tiếng Việt: 國旗共和人民中華 / Quốc kỳ Cộng hòa Nhân dân Trung Hoa
粵語: 中華人民共和國國旗
Vahcuengh: 中華人民共和國國旗；五星紅旗 / Cuŋƅvaƨ Yinƨminƨ Guŋƅoƨgoƨ goƨgeiƨ; Ŋuчsiŋ geiƨƅoeŋƨ / Cunghvaz Yinzminz Gunghozgoz gozgeiz; Nguxsing geizhoengz

td.p: Drawn by User:SKopp, redrawn by User:Denelson83 and User:Zscout370

a.title: File:Mao Zedong's proposal for the PRC flag.svg

li.a: Mao Zedong's proposal for the PRC flag.svg

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

img.alt: Public domain

span.i: I, the copyright holder of this work, hereby release it into the public domain. This applies worldwide.

span.small: In case this is not legally possible:
span.i: I grant anyone the right to use this work for any purpose, without any conditions, unless such conditions are required by law.

p.span: Afrikaans | Alemannisch | Aragonés | العربية | Asturianu | Azərbaycanca | Boarisch | Беларуская (тарашкевіца) | Български | Català | Cebuano | Soranî / کوردی | Česky | Cymraeg | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Estremeñu | فارسی | Suomi | Français | Galego | עברית | हिन्दी | Hrvatski | Magyar | Հայերեն | Bahasa Indonesia | Ido | Íslenska | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | ភាសាខ្មែរ | 한국어 | Ripoarisch | Kurdî | Latina | Lietuvių | Latviešu | 文言 | Македонски | മലയാളം | Bahasa Melayu | Plattdüütsch | Nederlands | ‪Norsk (nynorsk)‬ | ‪Norsk (bokmål)‬ | Polski | Português | Português do Brasil | Română | Русский | Slovenčina | Slovenščina | Shqip | Српски / Srpski | Svenska | ไทย | Türkçe | Українська | Vèneto | Tiếng Việt | Walon | 吴语 | Yorùbá | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | 粵語 | +/−

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

p.span: Alemannisch | Boarisch | Български | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Hrvatski | Magyar | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | മലയാളം | Plattdüütsch | Nederlands | Polski | Português | Română | Русский | ไทย | Українська | Vèneto | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | 粵語 | +/−

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 02:45, 15 July 2010

td.span: (Ok, I learned some new SVG code tricks, so I was able to apply the exact specs from GB 12982 to make sure this flag is very accurate with the stars.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:09, 28 September 2009

td.span: (Fixed according to GB 12982-2004: 国旗 National Flag)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 02:30, 16 June 2009

td.span: (restarigita al la versio de 08:20, 26 December 2008)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 01:48, 15 June 2009

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 22:48, 8 August 2008 (Please see talk page. Red flag is for most use))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 23:02, 8 August 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 07:06, 7 May 2008)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:48, 8 August 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 17:30, 6 May 2008)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:06, 7 May 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 14:35, 28 January 2008 gov.cn is PRC GOV website. and see zh:Wikipedia:互助客栈/其他/存档/2008年2月#由中华人民共和国国旗的颜色说开……)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:30, 6 May 2008

td.span: (real colors as most used by the government. Just because one website is wrong doesn't mean Wikipedia has te follow)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:43, 13 April 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 14:35, 28 January 2008 Just because the other flags are outdated does not mean we have to change this one to an inaccurate version)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 11:24, 9 April 2008

td.span: (stop reverting unless you change ALL the flags (civel flag etc.))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 14:35, 28 January 2008

td.span: (fix color, see [http://www.gov.cn/test/2005-05/24/content_18247.htm])

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:40, 5 July 2006

td.span: (Reverted to earlier revision)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:30, 5 July 2006

td.span: (Reverted to earlier revision)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:38, 5 July 2006

td.span: (less bytes, more exact, same colors, same licensing)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 14:41, 4 July 2006

td.span: (根据Image:Flag of the People's Republic of China.png fix color)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 01:52, 25 March 2006

td.span: (Star is now exact. Based on an idea of User:Pumbaa80.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 10:18, 21 March 2006

td.span: (recode, less bytes; same colors)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:52, 16 March 2006

td.span: (Modified the red background to #CE1126 and the yellow stars to #FCD116, according to the article about the flag of ORC on Chinese Wikipedia.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 14:43, 10 March 2006

td.span: (recode, cleared, same colors, same dimensions)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 03:31, 5 March 2006

td.span: (Star pattern made more geometrically sound, based on construction sheet at [http://www.vexilla-mundi.com/china.htm Vexilla Mundi])

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:57, 17 February 2006

td.span: (revert – discuss if you feel the colours are incorrect)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:53, 17 February 2006

td.span: (Reverted to earlier revision)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:52, 17 February 2006

td.span: (Reverted to earlier revision)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:34, 8 February 2006

td.span: (Pantone 032C for red, 109C for yellow, see discussion; scaled to 2x)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 08:33, 6 February 2006

td.span: (revert: Pantone colors are used for making real flags, not suitable for showing on the Web, some monitors especially LCDs can't show them correctly)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:44, 5 February 2006

td.span: (Pantone 186 C for red, 116 C for yellow (source: http://www.vexilla-mundi.com/china.htm))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 10:54, 27 November 2005

td.span: (The flag of the People's Republic of China. Source: Drawn by User:SKopp {{Template:Insignia}} Category:Flags of China Category:SVG flags)
